#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int palind(int x)
{
    int revers=0;
    while(x!=0)
    {
        revers*=10;
        revers+=x%10;
        x/=10;
    }
    return revers;
}
int main()
{
    int i,n,sum=0,counter=0;
    cin>>n;
    int arr[30];
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>arr[i];

    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        counter=0;
        sum=arr[i];
        while(sum!=palind(sum))
        {
            counter++;
            sum+=palind(sum);
        }
        cout<<counter<<" "<<sum<<endl;
    }
return 0;
}
